I think you can manage it. Just listen to your body cues and adjust your eating times. See if there is a pattern.

Medical Nutrition Therapy for Post-Bariatric Hypoglycemia: Practical Insights
Hypoglycemia is increasingly recognized as a complication of bariatric surgery. Although medications are often required, medical nutrition therapy remains the key cornerstone for successful prevention of hypoglycemia in patients with post-bariatric ...
